summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4679 for the improvement of the alley in block 10, University View Addition, from East 55th Street to East 57th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54274, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
